message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. Would you be willing to come down to $105?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $108?
